entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is described as straightening cushions compulsively, indicating her nervous behavior.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is described as pretending to read the paper but actually listening for an approaching car, showing his suspicious nature.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as crammed into an armchair with his hand clamped around his bottom, indicating his awkward and uncomfortable behavior.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as leaving the room due to tension and sitting on the stairs in the hall, showing his anxious state.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon is described as listening for an approaching car, and Harry is the one who is waiting to be picked up.
Uncle Vernon snarls at Harry when he says 'They're late!'
